thread.section_title: Tape Jungle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tape Jungle | tapejungle.com
thread.title: Kristina LeCloux
thread.title_full: Tape Jungle reviewed by Kristina LeCloux

author: Kristina LeCloux
title: Kristina LeCloux
text: I loved the fast shipping on my order of ATG scrapbooking tape and redline tape. It all works great is a 1/4 or less of the price of the name band of ATG tape. I have not had any issues yet. Love free shipping. I will need to stock up when the next sale is... St. Patricks Day Perhaps???
